page.title: 03TYPICAL DAY OF A STEELWORKER
page.content: A steelworker gets up{early}in the morning. Most of them go to work in a car. When they get to work they have to put on{special clothing.}They mostly have to wear helmets for { {safety}and so no sparks get in their eyes with hard shoes to protect their feet.They wear overalls so they do not get dirty. Most steelworkers take a packed lunch, and eat in a cabin or a office. The average man works{eight {hours}a day and nearly all of them work{shifts.}Their favourite {hobbies}are sports, like football, fishing and weight training. Most of the{fathers}and{grandfathers}of the workers worked at B.S.C. too. Some of the companies run a social club. The wokers like to spend their{leisure time at home, watching television because when they get home from work they are very{tired.
